short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find all email address in the current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily find any email address from a web page. Visit any website and click on the extension button to get the list of email. Copy the emails from the popup box.
